comments.body: `PowerState` can only be one of these 3 values, is there a need to check the state value at all?  Or have you seen a VM somehow in another power state?

No I have not. But I thought this will safeguard the code against any future SDK changes if new states are introduced. Also this code sort of documents that, we consider these 3 states as VM being still available, anything else is not available. 

But - I can remove this if you think, that is better.
ok, I suppose it is fine as-is, could you add a comment to clarify for others?

I think this change of Exists() is helpful for reader, is right?
Yeah, that is not required.
